text: "Love of My Life" is a 1976 song by Queen and is the fourth and final single from their fourth studio album A Night at the Opera. It was later released as a live single from their live album Live Killers and went to number 63 in the United Kingdom and number 1 in Brazil and Argentina. == References == Category:1976 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Queen (band) songs Category:Scorpions (band) songs
title: Love of My Life (Queen song)
